title: Quarkus 2.4.0.Final released - Hibernate Reactive 1.0.0, Kafka Streams DevUI, Multi module continuous testing, AWT image resize via new AWT extension and much more
content: Today, we release Quarkus 2.4.0.Final which includes a lot of refinements and improvements and some new features: Hibernate Reactive 1.0.0.Final Introducing Kafka Streams DevUI Support continuous testing for multi module projects Support AWT image resize via new AWT extension Migration Guide To migrate from 2.3, please refer to our migration...
